metadata.title: Practice Languages with AI Tutors & Real Teachers | Easy Speak
metadata.description: Easy Speak combines adaptive AI teachers and professional human tutors for effective language learning. Get personalized speaking practice, receive instant feedback on your pronunciation, and achieve fluency faster.
metadata.keywords: learn English online, AI language tutor, speaking practice, conversation practice, improve pronunciation, online language school, fluent English, English with native speakers, adaptive learning, language learning app

landing.faqDescription: Find answers to common questions about how our language learning application works, privacy, and cryptocurrency transactions.
landing.howDoesItWorkDesc: Our language learning application provides a user-friendly platform for teachers and students to connect. It utilizes cryptocurrency payments for added privacy and security.
landing.isAnonymousDesc: Yes, our application ensures anonymity by not requiring any banking information. You can enjoy the benefits of learning a new language without compromising your privacy.
landing.easySpeakDesc1: Discover the power of EasySpeak and unlock your potential to speak confidently and fluently in a short amount of time. Join our community and start your journey to improved speaking skills today!
landing.descriptionSection1: Our language learning application offers an anonymous and secure environment for teachers and students. With crypto payments, you can enjoy the benefits of a decentralized currency without the need for traditional banking information.
landing.blockPayDescription: Effortless transactions: embrace the future of payment
landing.blockLearnDescription: Experience the benefits of anonymous language learning
landing.blockDiscoverTitle: Discover the power of our app
landing.blockDiscoverDescription: Learn at your own pace with our easy-to-use interface
landing.titleSection3: Discover our innovative Language Learning App
landing.descriptionSection3: Our application offers a range of benefits for both teachers and students. Teachers can easily create and manage their language courses, while students can enjoy a seamless learning experience with speaking lessons and personalized feedback.
landing.blockStep1Title: Join our language learning community today!
landing.blockStep1Description: Signing up is quick and easy. Begin your journey by creating a profile. The app helps students explore lessons and  teachers showcase their expertise.
landing.blockStep2Title: Explore lessons and connect with the right match
landing.blockStep2Description: Discover a diverse range of lessons. For students, find the perfect teacher, and for teachers, showcase your lessons to connect with eager learners.
landing.blockStep3Title: Start your journey to learn a new language
landing.blockStep3Description: Finalize your connection by booking lessons (for students) or getting booked (for teachers). Pay with crypto and start the learning journey!
